title: Man accidentally shoots self in torso at sports bar
content:
LAS VEGAS (KTNV) - A man received serious injuries after he accidentally shot himself at a sports bar Friday night.
Las Vegas police reported around 9:30 p.m., the 61-year-old man mishandled his .22 revolver and accidentally discharged a round into his torso at Mr. D's Sports Bar, located near Rainbow and Oakey boulevards.
He was transported to UMC Trauma in serious condition.
This is a developing story. Check back to 13 Action News for updates.
